data.name: Avoiding FOMO
data.text: Don't make investment decisions based on fear of missing out (FOMO). Instead, do your research and make informed decisions based on your own goals and risk tolerance.

questions.text: What should you avoid when making investment decisions?
What should you do instead of making decisions based on FOMO?
Should you make investment decisions based on your own goals and risk tolerance?

data.name: Staying Calm
data.text: Stay calm and don't let your emotions get in the way of your investment decisions. Remember that the market fluctuates and ups and downs are normal.

questions.text: Should you let your emotions guide your investment decisions?
What should you do instead of letting your emotions guide your investment decisions?
